beside.translation[0].definitions[0].def: next to or very close to the side of someone or something
beside.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Wendy came up and sat beside me.
I was standing right beside her at the time.
beside.translation[0].definitions[1].def: in comparison with something or someone
beside.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: This year’s sales figures don’t look very good beside last year’s results.
The children seemed tiny beside him.
